name: 王柄雄
objective: This course is intended to deliver fundamental knowledge about the principles of mechanics based on which most of the professional and advanced courses in civil engineering were developed. The main topics will include vectors and scalars, motion in one and two dimensions, Newton’s laws of motion, work and energy, conservation of energy, linear and angular momentum, oscillatory motion, mechanical waves, fluid mechanics, temperature and the kinetic theory of gases, the laws of thermodynamics, etc.
schedule:
Major Topics include:
1.	Energy and energy transfer
2.	Potential energy
3.	Momentum and collisions
4.	Rotational motion
5.	Mechanical waves
6.	Fluid mechanics
scorePolicy:
Attendance and interaction 10%
Homework 20%
Midterm exam 35%
Final exam 35%
materials:
1.	Serway R.A., Jewett J.W., Tsai S.F. (2022). Principles of Physics: A Calculus Approach, Asia edition, Cengage Learning Asia Pte. Ltd.
2.	Harris Benson (2020). University Physics, third revised edition, Ting Lung Book Co.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
